description: This file defines a React functional component named FiltersSidebar that provides UI controls for filtering recipes by cuisine, ingredient, maximum ready time, and sorting options. It manages state for each filter, updates based on external values, and invokes callback functions when filters are applied or reset.

methods.name: FiltersSidebar({ cuisines = [], ingredients = [], values = { cuisine: '', ingredient: '', maxReadyTime: '', sort: 'relevance' }, onApply, onReset })
methods.description: React functional component to render filter controls for recipes.

methods.name: apply
methods.description: Function that calls the onApply callback with current filter states when the 'Apply' button is clicked.

ctags.name: FiltersSidebar
ctags.signature: ({ cuisines = [], ingredients = [], values = { cuisine: '', ingredient: '', maxReadyTime: '', sort: 'relevance' }, onApply, onReset })
